attributes.action: Stop commercial work vans parking on residential roads overnight!!
attributes.additional_details: Tradesman who get a commercial company van shuch as window fitting vans, mountjoy vans flat bed colas vans ect.. The majority of tradesman have a car and their spouse will have a vehicle too so having these big commercial work vans taking up residential parking is forcing alot of people to park several blocks away from there home or Park on double yellow lines which leads up to parking tickets!!
attributes.background: Tradesman who have a commercial company van shuch as window fitting vans, mountjoy vans flat bed colas vans ect.. The majority of tradesman have a car and their spouse will have a vehicle too,  causing other residents to park several blocks from their home or getting fines for double yellow parking!
